players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Alice was killed on the first night. We need to figure out who among Charlie, Diana, and myself is the mafioso. I'm a villager, so I know it's either Charlie or Diana."
You: "Diana and Charlie, your silence is suspicious. The mafioso killed Alice night 1, so one of you two is the killer. If you're town, speak up and help us find the mafioso!"
Diana: "Diana here. Bob, I investigated Charlie last night. He's the mafioso."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
